title: Was BravoRay ready for this when the team pinned on Swain
body:
As one who has very strong faith in our Noxian birdman. I just want to know how he had felt when ChampUp choose Swain. 
Maybe he just grow his own lovely raven wings now.

Trying to stop myself from asking for too much here, but what inspires your idea of Swain?
Ddo you start with good ideas in this project? I hope so :D

Will he have a metal login? I'm not complaining, but we've seen a few metal themes lately. 



More metal themes.

Hey Ray, as someone who's been looking forward to this VGU for a long time, would you be able to give me an example of an influence on you for the direction of his aesthetic? From another series, film, etc.

Hey Bravo! Quick question, you designed the Tyrant Swain skin, and I always thought of it as Swain's current 'canon' look because that's how he looks in the last Journal of Justice.

Now with the VGU and everything, does that mean you can't really import features from the Tyrant skin, even though they might be relevant? How would you differentiate from the new 'base' skin from the Tyrant skin in that case?

Or is that still up in the air?
That's how I am with Talon. I just love him so much. <3 Also, can't wait to see if Swain still counters the every loving hell out of Talon. (i've always struggled with that matchup)

I was about to ask the exact same question!

It's also really cool when someone with  the strongest passion toward a champion gets to work on them and it will definitely add to Swain as a renewed champion if Larry is really working on him. :D
So is BravoRay a rioter who plays a lot of Swain?

I have been known to play a little Swain inn my time /:P
Damn it. I was hoping my "Yeah, pizza is ok,"  utterance would win the Understatement of the Year award, but that's all over now.

what do you think about this swain passive that i created a while back?

Swain needs to be more unique than just "send x pet to do x dmg to x person", especially considering swain is the ruler of an empire so its just not fitting for him to let his pet do all the work. having the bird be a silent and ominous sign to swains true form is just more fitting.

So what if swain passive is unique and not been ever seen in the rift before. Its like how wards works like this,

swain passive;

He commands beatrice to go into a certain location by making beatrice voluntarily goes to a bush nearest to swains range of sight. it has a cool down of 1 min before beatrice can go to a certain bush again and while this is active beatrice is invulnerable. while this is active you can know a certain ganks/champs in that location(ps: it has a greater range to wards) and if beatrice sees a champ she will scream alerting swain. but when swain goes to base she will go to the base too to balance the passive of course lol. and and if swain leaves from the place where beatrice is active even without finishing 1 min she will just flies back to swain and finds a target bush again close to swain like that.

defending this passive:

we all know that swain is a tactician and commanding beatrice like this is the best way and not like the "send x pet to do x dmg to x person" because its overrated in the game and i want his kit(the activating ones) will only relay on his own power. another advantage of this skill is that it will make room for swain to place wards and help him in his tactics and another is that it will be a great passive in the top lane placing it in the bush besides the river alerting him in ganks. the flaws of this passive is that enemy champs can see beatrice but beatrice is invulnerable and they will know that it is warded whist they can also hear beatrice alerting swain so the possibilities is .. it will make them leave the area and make swain more concentrated on killing his laner. lastly, it would be nice to predict what the enemy will do (atleast for seconds) whilst the player can think what the next thing he will do.
